Message.Title: Option trader'z widow maker
Message.Msg: If sybil had tried to short this by proxy of long term or weekly puts instead of directly shorting the underlying then sybil would have been long ago deceased on time decay alone, nevermind the diminished volitilty premium. Amzn the option trader'z widow maker... Sybs tried to warn everyone on this.... While sybs cant pick tops and bottomz with the accuracy of a bush master with a high powered scope, sybs did call the optionz scam like the babe pointing out to center field ahead of the shot.... Sybs would have been well to strangle option trade this piggy(sell a put / sell a call), but sybil contendz that hind sight iz no substitute for robots with manipulative control of the underlying selling optionz . Sybs stays away from optionz in their entirety.

Message.Title: Scamazon iz clearly in a downtrend with its former uptrend broken and damaged by institution distribution
Message.Msg: Bots cant make money on puts like they used to with volitlity so low, and this pig haz flown its course. This all comez together and allowz the patient short trader an easy choice: Maintain existing shorts or open a position for a long term sell, hold and subtract the rips strategy If it goez up to the 50 sma (267 ish) short more if you comfy doing so, if it goes up to 285 short more with targets to add more at 300, 320, 340, and 360. Hold all shorts 'for an extended period of time', opting to swing trade a portion at historic support levelz of 205, 170, 120, and look to reshort the swing trade position on pops of 20% or more from the cover point. Always make sure that you have sharez to make final coverz at 50.00 or less Stay away from optionz at all timez - they are a scam. This iz a very easy stock to short provided that you dont get nervous, and you dont swing for the fence.

Message.Title: Sybil haz neverbeen more confident a short trader than now
Message.Msg: With the construct of a leveraged US ballance sheet clearly propping up the markets , unsustainable spending that cannot be reigned in in any way by a do nothing congress addicted to spending on both sidez of the isle, and reliance on consumer spending to prop up gdp - 55% of which draw unsustainable government payroll and benes checks, flat : declining : under employed wagez coupled with rising debt rates and rising gvt reliance on ssi / medicare ; there has never been an easier more clear cur time to get short and stay short : not in 1928, in 1973, in 1986, in 1999, in 2007. All technical indicatorz on the charts coupled with very weak underlying fundementalz are ringing warning alarmz galoure of an immenent and NASTY crash. Eom.
Tech so many issues with AMZN, but people still want to keep this charade up. This should be 200 points lower and then it would be at fair value.

Topic.Title: It all depends on Cyprus & Europe, REALLY

Message.Msg: Not really, ex. The cyprus story iz too visible to be teid to an immediate crash. The crash to come wether it be sooner or later will be followed by a US domestic story thus far untold and unknown by all, including the fed. but the story will come to full light following SEVERE damage in the markets only to exacerbate an already nasty crash wave thats in full play. Vsybil doesnt know the story for sure, but knows it will come from unaccounted for risk built in the artificial market run up. Sybil imaginz it will be tied to ine of many possibilities. Here's a few catylysts including but not limited to: Forced end to the fed support of the markets by foriegn buyerz of treasuriez insisting on a higher risk rate of return Skulldugary in the easy money corporate bond underwriting markets Skulldugary and banking shananaginz in the otb derivativez and counter party markets that bet on the blow up of the bond markets Skullduggary and banking shannaniganz in the etf izization of the american markets which use derivativez and swaps that will not be honored in the full force of the coming market collapse Skulldugary and banking shanaganz associated with underwriting unsustainable muni and state bond debt that iz currently being rated 'high grade' debt which wont be paid back Finacial War and / or Foriegn espionage / attack on a weakened US financial system Catastrophic acts of nature or god on a compromized country with weakened infrustructure and compromized financial security All out collapse of the USD and removal of it az the world reserve currency There are many many more risks unaccounted for or underaccounted for in the US markets, but rest assured that what every the 'story' behind the collapse, it will be a surprize to most, will most likely be under played when it starts, and when the drop starts will be very very sudden. Now that being said, cyprus could be a story that leadz to the beginning of the end for the EU and western markets as BS was to L
